ValidationRule.description: Est Liquid Assests field must be populated on General Leads (record type) when converted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && RecordType.DeveloperName = "General" && IsConverted && ISBLANK(Est_Liquid_Assets__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Purchased List")) && (ISBLANK(ConvertedDate) || ConvertedDate > DATE(2022,01,01))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Est Liquid Assets must be populated before converting a lead
